--- ### @mixin container Shouldn't be nested. Adds clearfix when used without flexbox and removes clearfix when used as flexbox. Adds a max-width and left and right padding following the responsive gutters. #### Arguments | Name | Type | Default | Description | | ---- | ---- | ------- | ----------- | | `flexbox` | `boolean` | `false` | Enables flexbox on container. For example `@include container(true);` will set `display: flex` and `flex-wrap: wrap` | | `alignment` | `string` | `center` | Align container to left, center or right | #### Dependencies For flexbox to work properly it uses Modernizr `.flexbox.flexwrap` #### SCSS {% highlight css %} .foo { @include container; } {% endhighlight %} #### CSS {% highlight css %} .foo { margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; max-width: 1176px; padding-left: 16px; padding-right: 16px; } .foo:before, .foo:after { display: table; content: " "; } .foo:after { clear: both; } @media screen and (min-width: 560px) { .foo { padding-left: 24px; padding-right: 24px; } } @media screen and (min-width: 1024px) { .foo { padding-left: 32px; padding-right: 32px; } } {% endhighlight %}
